items.name: Brussel Sprouts
items.description: Fried brussel sprouts, tossed in honey garlic glaze, with bacon, parmesan, served with truffle aioli

items.name: Cheese Curds
items.description: Hill Valley, Battered and fried cheddar curds. Jalapeno Ranch & Sundried tomato aioli

items.name: Garlic Pretzel Bites
items.description: IPA White Cheddar Sauce

items.name: Brewers Bites
items.description: Fried mac n cheese bites, filled with chorizo, hatch green chilis, Hot Honey, served with IPA white cheddar sauce

items.name: Baked Goat Cheese
items.description: Lemon and herb goat cheese dip, garlic breadcrumbs, Grilled Pita.

items.name: Brewery Burger
items.description: 8oz Chuck, brisket, and short rib blend. Bacon & onion jam, gruyere cheese, arugula, tomato, roasted garlic aioli, brioche bun and fries

items.name: Hot Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Buttermilk fried chicken breast, hot honey glaze, house pickles, pickled vegetable and jalapeno slaw served with fries

items.name: Bratwurst Roll
items.description: Hometown Sausage Bratwurst, Beer braised onions, wholegrain mustard aioli, pretzel roll served with fries

items.name: Baked Mac n Cheese
items.description: IPA white cheddar sauce, herb breadcrumbs, chives. Add Chicken $5

items.name: Wings
items.description: 6 or 12 Traditional wings served with buffalo, bourbon bbq, mango habanero, thai chili, zess pepper ranch, or garlic parmesan. Not available on Fridays

items.name: Caeser
items.description: Romaine lettuce, Creamy caeser dressing, grated parmesan, shaved parmesan, garlic pretzel croutons

items.name: Apple Arugula
items.description: Granny smith apples, shallots, candied walnuts, gorgonzola, honey IPA vinaigrette

items.name: Fall Mixed Greens
items.description: Roasted butternut squash, dried cranberries, spiced pecans, goat cheese, maple dijon vinaigrette

items.name: Shrimp Scampi
items.description: Tail on shrimp, garlic, red pepper flakes, linguini, IPA Infused butter sauce, breadcrumbs.

items.name: Short Rib Gnocchi
items.description: Beer Braised Beef short ribs, kale, baby carrots, gnocchi, beer braise reduction

items.name: Ale Glazed Salmon
items.description: Ale & Honey Glazed Grilled Salmon, Herb Roasted Fingerling Potatoes, Broccolini

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Garlic herb breaded chicken breast, penne pasta, alfredo sauce, grated parmesan

items.name: Truffle Pear
items.description: White garlic sauce, anjou pears, shredded fontina, truffle oil, balsamic glaze, arugula

items.name: Spicy Pepperoni
items.description: Sliced pepperoni and sopresetta, shredded and fresh mozzarella, hot honey

items.name: Bacon & Beer
items.description: IPA white cheddar sauce, bacon, pancetta, mozzarella, cheddar, chives.

items.name: Wild Mushroom
items.description: Roasted wild mushroom blend, fontina, alfredo cream sauce, truffle oil, parsley

items.name: Truffle Tots
items.description: Truffle oil, parmesan, chives, Garlic Aioli

items.name: Side House Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, tomato, onion, ranch.

items.name: White Bean Chicken Chili
items.description: Salsa Verde based, Cilantro, Shredded Chicken, northern white beans, Topped with Lime Crema Pickled Onions.

items.name: Beef Chili
items.description: Peppers, Onions, Ground Beef, Pinto Beans, Kidney Beans. Topped with Cheddar Cheese & Green Onions.

items.name: Grilled Pacific Cod
items.description: Lemon & herb grilled, served with coleslaw, tartar sauce and French fries.

items.name: Fried Cod
items.description: House beer battered cod, served with coleslaw, tartar, and French fries

items.name: Fried Perch
items.description:
Zander pike perch, panko breaded. Served with coleslaw, tartar sauce and French fries. 
Upgrade to potato pancakes + $3

items.name: Herb Crusted 14oz Prime Rib
items.description: Served with Vegetable of the day, Choice of Baked Potato or French Fries, Au Jus, & creamy Horseradish

items.name: Apple Strudel Eggrolls
items.description: Apple pie filled and fried eggrolls, cinnamon sugar, white icing.

items.name: Seasonal Cheesecake
items.description: Rotating homemade cheesecake. Ask for flavors.

items.name: Brownie Sundae
items.description: Cast iron brownie, peanut butter icecream, caramel, roasted peanut
